# cubethemes

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

{cubethemes} was designed to enable cubies to create great data visualisations that comply with the Cube Group Brand Guidelines.

{cubethemes} functions have now been merged into the [cubieR](https://github.com/zerogetsamgow/cubieR) package.
